channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Red light is out", 31st October
item.description:
The red light to go straight at this junction, eastbound on A1201, is not working. See screenshot for location

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 216, St. Paul's Road, Highbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pub waste is incorrectly bagged, 31st October
item.description:
Pub dumps waste with no care. Bags split and waste is left on payment - usually happens after the cleaners have come through. Pavement is stained and waste remains for rodents to sort out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Great Portland Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Artificial Light Nuisance from Hackney Bridge, 31st October
item.description:
Strong Artificial Lights from Hackney Bridge are shining directly towards residential apartments at Copper street affecting resident's ability to enjoy rest at home. The light Issue started on 31/10/2025.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): East Bay Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
